snippet.title: Eagle Island Twist - Release Trailer (Playstation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and Steam)
snippet.description:
Play Eagle Island Twist: http://swm.to/EagleIslandTwist
Eagle Island's free expansion Twist is available now on Playstation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch and Steam! Soar across Eagle Island as Fia, using your fowl friend Kusako as a projectile and restore peace. This action-packed adventure features crisp pixel art, dynamic stage mechanics, and retro-style platforming with an aerial twist.

High-flying adventure awaits you on Eagle Island!
https://screenwavegames.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ScreenwaveGames
Join the Discord: discord.gg/u2xSz8AT2z 

(No birds were harmed in the making of this game.)
#indiegames #indiegame #roguelike
